trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the exception that is thrown when the channel detects that the message is a poison message.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler unntak oppstod under kanalen oppdager at meldingen er et giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the channel detects that Message Queuing (MSMQ) aborted processing in the message because the number of retry attempts exceeded the value specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.ReceiveRetryCount%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.MaxRetryCycles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne unntak når kanalen oppdager at Message Queuing (MSMQ) avbrutt behandling i meldingen fordi antall nye forsøk er overskredet verdien som er angitt av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.ReceiveRetryCount%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.MaxRetryCycles%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.MaxRetryCycles%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqElementBase.ReceiveRetryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified lookup ID of the poison message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte oppslags-IDen for giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: The lookup ID of the poison message.
trans-unit.target: Oppslags-IDen for giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified message text.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte teksten.

trans-unit.source: The message with which to initialize the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal starte ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified lookup ID of the poison message, and the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte oppslags-IDen for Giftmelding, og det interne unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The lookup ID of the poison message.
trans-unit.target: Oppslags-IDen for giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception to be encapsulated by the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Det interne unntaket innkapsles av ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class with additional serialized information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> serialisert klassen med ekstra informasjon om unntaket.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that holds the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> -forekomst som inneholder de serialiserte dataene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instance that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>forekomsten som inneholder kilde og mål for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class by using the specified message text and the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av angitte meldingsteksten og det interne unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The message with which to initialize the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal starte ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception to be encapsulated by the new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Det interne unntaket innkapsles av ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>, and the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den serialiserte dataene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref>, og kilden og målet for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance to hold the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> forekomsten har de serialiserte dataene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instance to hold the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>forekomst til kilden og målet for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqPoisonMessageException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the lookup ID of the poison message.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppslags-IDen for giftmelding.

trans-unit.source: The lookup ID of the poison message.
trans-unit.target: Oppslags-IDen for giftmelding.
